name: nonadaptive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not able to change to suit changing conditions: Such people might be conservative in temperament and be generally non-adaptive . Psychotherapy may be helpful in the treatment of nonadaptive behaviour problems.
biology
  specialized Non-adaptive features or changes do not make an organism more suited to its environment: It has been suggested that deer's antlers may be non-adaptive features. A lot of evolutionary change may be nonadaptive.
More examplesFewer examplesEach child was rated on adaptive and non-adaptive behaviours. Adolescence is a time when the chances of nonadaptive change significantly increase.Differences in the length of people's toes is random and nonadaptive. Custom networks allow a combination of adaptive and non-adaptive components to work together.
